room_title: Escape room "The Inheritance" by Escape Room Clearwater Beach in Tampa
room_description: Your group has been summoned to receive an unexpected inheritance of your distant Great Uncle Marvin; a man of whom you didn't know existed until only moments ago. As a career government researcher and scientist, his last request was for his heirs to complete his work for which he considered a triumph for humanity. It is up to your group to crack Uncle Marvinâ€™s passwords, decode his secret codes, and complete his history changing research.
